snippet: The officials were prominent in a report on misuse of authority and waste of government money and were to appear before a House committee for questioning.
abstract: Veteran Affairs Dept refuses to allow five of its officials, all identified prominently in critical report about agency, to appear before House Veterans Affairs Committee, saying their appearance would affect investigation of allegations in report; committee members unanimously vote to subpoena the five officials in latest example of tension between Congress and VA.
lead_paragraph: The officials were prominent in a report on misuse of authority and waste of government money and were to appear before a House committee for questioning.

headline.print_headline: In Standoff, V.A. Won’t Let Five Officials Testify, Antagonizing Congress
headline.main: V.A. Won’t Let 5 Officials Testify, Antagonizing Congress
